name: Accuracy
description: You certainly remember lessons of your master-at-arms. Your ears still hurt for shooting those arrows gods know where. Now even elves will be jelaous of your aiming skills.
effect: Advancing this skill decreases amount of arrows you need in combat.

name: Agile Soldier
description: You are a true born fighter. Doing what you love inspires and excites you.
effect: Advancing this skill increases chance to regenerate stamina during attack.

name: Aiming
description: Every ranger knows the necessity of practice and adjustment to a new target. With training and experience, you learn to aim faster.
effect: Advancing this skill reduces time needed to gain stats bonus.

name: Alchemy
description: Devotion to mysterious arts of potion making taught you how to create useful elixirs from trivial ingredients.
effect: Advancing this skill allows you to brew more advanced potions.

name: All That Glitters
description: After successful defence, you are able to find extra gold lying on the ground.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the gold you obtain on the battlefield in a successful defence.

name: Armor Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while wearing any armor.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Barn Robber
description: You pay more attention to the resources, rather than gold, so you focus on robbing barns, not banks.
effect: Advancing this skill increases number of stock you obtain on the battlefield.

name: Blacksmith's Wonders
description: Your hand is steady and your hammer is swift. Magic powers granted to you from above allow you to occasionally duplicate an item.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the chance to craft an extra item

name: Blunt Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while bearing a blunt weapon.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Bow Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while bearing a bow.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Broker
description: As an experienced trader, you are able to look after numerous exchange deals at a time.
effect: Advancing this skill increases maximum number of stock exchange deals.

name: Collection
description: Trained eyes and natural senses help you to find more spoils upon exploration of the forests and wild territories.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the amount of resources found.

name: Combat Potions Mastery
description: Even quiet, undistinguished scientists have to participate in warfare. Such practices allow you to make combat use of your potions - poison foes, heal friends, enchance yourself.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus stats from potions. It also increases chance to poison an enemy or heal an ally.

name: Crafting
description: Being an expert in your craftsmanship gives you an ability to craft complex items.
effect: Advancing this skill allows you to craft more complicated items.

name: Critical Hit
description: Your muscles are filled with weird power and you strike with all your might. Unfortunately it happens once so often.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the chance to deal a critical strike.

name: Curiousity
description: During the battle you scatter through the battlefield, looking for a shiny coin.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the gold you obtain on the battlefield.

name: Dagger Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while bearing a dagger.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Educated Technician
description: Like a true master you are, every time you craft an item, you learn something new.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the daily limit for bonus experience you gain from crafting.

name: Enduring Shieldbearer
description: You are a true born protector. Doing what you love inspires and excites you.
effect: Advancing this skill increases chance to regenerate stamina during defence.

name: Enlightened Warrior
description: Being a naturally born warrior, you learn from your victories and losses, coming out wiser from every battle.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the daily limit for bonus experience you gain from the battle.

name: Gifted Pathfinder
description: You are a true born traveller. Doing what you love inspires and exites you.
effect: Advancing this skill increases chance to regenerate stamina during quests.

name: Hamster
description: Your inner hamster shows you the new ways to hide your stock.
effect: Advancing this skill decreases the amount of stock you lose upon your castle being breached.

name: Harvest
description: Your studies of herbology help you to spot and collect useful and precious ingredients, whilst enjoying really nice and sunny quests.
effect: Advancing this skill increases chance and amount of herbs found in quests.

name: Hawkeye
description: Your arrow pierced your enemy to the ground. It makes it really hard for him to participate in the battle.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the chance to wound an enemy.

name: Heavy Armor Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while wearing heavy armor.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Labeling
description: Ability to organise stock logistics and arrange items appropriately allows you to save storage space.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the size of your stock.

name: Light Armor Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while wearing light armor.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Long Life
description: In search for an ultimate elixir of eternal life, you managed to at least extend your endurance on expeditions and quests.
effect: Advancing this skill increases maximum stamina limit.

name: Look! A coin!
description: Your ancestors must be related to dragons or dwarfs, otherwise how else to explain your excellent sense of gold?
effect: Advancing this skill increases the chance to get more and the amount of gold obtained from quests.

name: Natural Talent
description: Your teacher tought you how to use your inner energy.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the amount of mana you have.

name: Perceptive Seeker
description: Having a sharp eye, you are able to learn from everything you see while on an adventure.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the daily limit for bonus experience you gain from the quests.

name: Perception
description: description
effect: effect

name: Power Napping
description: Being a mobile warrior, you are used to rest at any place under any conditions. Instantly going to sleep and making the most out of quick breaks isn't a problem for you.
effect: Advancing this skill increases speed of stamina regeneration, while you are at rest.

name: Protector
description: Being an honourable man, you look after your local villages, scouting for raiders.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the chance to meet a person pillaging a village.

name: Prudent Duelist
description: Being an excellent duelist, you learn more from your victories at the arena.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the daily limit for bonus experience you gain from the arena.

name: Raider
description: Being a fierce warrior you loot every single coin you can find during your attacks.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the gold you obtain on the battlefield in a successful attack.

name: Rare Mutation
description: You were trained for this since you were a little kid. They were feeding you strange mushrooms and herbs. Now you can drink potions that would otherwise be poisonous as if they were water. But as a result, you are sterile.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the duration effect of the potions.

name: Robe Armor Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while wearing robe armor.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Scavanger
description: After a successful defence, you try to find something useful to take back home.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the chance to find an item on the battlefield.

name: Shield Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while bearing a shield.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Smart Explorer
description: Mysterious objects hide many secrets. You always learn something new, when you find them.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the daily limit for bonus experience you gain from finding extra items.

name: Spear Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while bearing a spear.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Sword Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while bearing a sword.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Tactics
description: True protector studies how his enemies attack. That allows him to develop unique tactics that are most efficient against specific foes.
effect: Advancing this skill decreases effectiveness of attack from selected castle.

name: Tight Grip
description: Your firm grip prevents you from losing your equipment on the battlefield.
effect: Advancing this skill decreases the chance to lose your equipment on the battlefield.

name: Weapon Mastery
description: Experience and training grant you bonus stats while bearing any weapon.
effect: Advancing this skill increases bonus granted to stats.

name: Wise Alchemist
description: With every potion you create, you think of a new way to improve your technique.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the daily limit for bonus experience you gain from brewing.

name: Work to Standards
description: By mastering every technique known to mankind, you have created your own blueprints that allow you to save some materials.
effect: Advancing this skill increases the chance and the amount of materials saved while crafting.
